de.engehausen.treemap.swt.impl

Class CushionRectangleRendererEx<N>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.swt.impl.CushionRectangleRenderer<N>
      • de.engehausen.treemap.swt.impl.CushionRectangleRendererEx<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of node the renderer supports
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRectangleRenderer<N,PaintEvent,Color>

    public class CushionRectangleRendererEx<N>
extends CushionRectangleRenderer<N>
    Rectangle renderer that attempts to produce a "cushion effect" for the rectangles. It does not paint any labels. The highlight method highlights the selected node and frames it in red. The topmost parent under the root node is framed in yellow.

        Parameters:
        colorRangeSize - the number of colors to use for the cushion; must be > 1
